original_title: Belcanto. The Tenors of the 78 Era - Part I
overview: n the late 1990s (I think – EuroArts is not forthcoming with this information), film-maker Jan Schmidt-Garre created a series of thirteen nearly half-hour television programs about tenors who lived, sang, and recorded during der Schellackzeit – the time of the 78-rpm record. Six of those programs are collected here, back to back, and I assume that the other seven will be along presently.
title: Belcanto. The Tenors of the 78 Era - Part I
